survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
Go left to find the snake
okay, i've moved left and i see a tiger on a small island
Mmm, aunque no hay ninguna serpiente a la vista. ¿Adónde vamos ahora?
go left again going through a stick to avoid the pond
okay, pasé el palo y llegué a una isla más grande con un loro en un árbol
and now that?
okay, now go right crossing the pond using the rocks
alright, cruzado las rocas y aqui estoy en una isla nueva con una rana
¿qué sigue?
now go left, use the cocrodile to avoid the pond
alright, he tomado la ruta a la izquierda y he llegado a la gran isla con el elefante dándome la bienvenida
shall we continue?
go left once again using the rocks to avoid the pond
ok, now i see a giraffe
¿Adónde vamos ahora?
go down using the stick to avoid the pond
listo, fui hacia abajo y encontré una serpiente
now go right and you will arrive to your destination
great! tras dos pasos a la derecha, aquí está el tesoro
*finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Where should i go?
hey! let's start by going west, pass the wooden bench until you cross a trail headed towards a florist's stand
pero espera, no llegues al puesto de esa floristería. simplemente haz un giro en U y regresa hacia nuestro amigo perro blanco.
voy hacia abjo para encontrar al otro perro o voy a la izquierda para la floristeria?
vamos a hacer ambos, ¡tranquilo! continua de nuevo hacia el perro, pero esta vez vamos a cruzar por encima de esa rama y dirigirnos al sur
you'll find the other dog next to a checkered picnic tablecloth
now where should I got?
go west, step over the mat and head toward that bowl of berries
sigue hacia el oeste, mi amigo
towards the deer, or towards the people on the bike?
ah, not the deer yet! let's cross that wooden branch over the river towards the north
okay, now where should I head?
cool! now, let's avoid touching the green bush
Rodéalo desde tu derecha hasta llegar al puesto de floristería.
okay, now where should I go?
gira a la izquierda y pasa por debajo del stand
You are going to see a big bridge with two people on bicycles. go west over the bridge
okay,now what?
just past the bridge, you'll see two old guys reading their newspapers on a bench
¡dirígete hacia allá!
where now?
move south just a few steps, in between the old folks and another branch
you'll find a green bush at the end of that branch
okay,now what?
Ve hacia el este, entre esa rama y el arbusto.

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
go down a few steps until you find a route
alright, moving down, now i see a dog by a fire
¿Qué camino debo tomar desde aquí?
go past over the fire and put yourself between the fire and the dog
cool, now i'm between the fire and the dog
spot anything else for me to head to?
now go right again and put yourselft between the mushroom and the fire
gotcha! now i'm between the fire and the red mushroom
¿que sigue?
now go down until you find a telescope
alrighty then, found the blue telescope
now what?
go past the telescope going between the telescope and the bush to the right until you find the trail again.
ok, i's going between the telescope and bush
¡Bingo encontró el rastro! ¿ahora que?
go left until you find some rock
done, now i'm at the rocks
go up, and then left until you find a house
awesome! i see the house
*finalizado*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
donde voy?
primero, ve bajo el primer árbol al suroeste
turn right, pass the second tree, then make a sharp left before the third tree and go south. ready for the next move?
okay, now what
now, keep going but make sure to steer left of the cute brown pup
Después de pasarlo, gire a la izquierda y luego gire a la derecha nuevamente hacia el sur. bastante sencillo hasta ahora, ¿eh?
now what
okay, you'll see a big rock to your left and a small one to your right. just go straight between 'em till you hit the water
dive in. how's the water?
okay, and now?
spot that big red crab? okay, take a turn to the right and keep with the big rock on your side
continúa de esta manera
do i go towards the crab, or away from it?
nah, leave the crab alone
just keep heading west along the big rock. pretty simple so far, right?
now waht
keep on truckin' till you get to a medium-sized rock
Tengo un tiburón como compañía en el agua. ¡No te preocupes, simplemente gira a la derecha hacia el tiburón!
and
time to return to dry land
cross between the medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball, and then continue north. ready for the next step?
where to
now, take a tiny veer left and walk towards northwest. you'll see a red tent on your left and a loudspeaker on your right
ve entre ellos. genial configuración, ¿eh?
and
take a scenic walk around the tent in a lovely arc
then head south. but don't go all the way to the water, just shy of the shore turn right
cuando dices right, te refieres hacia el balon o la canoa?
towards the canoe, better known as the red kayak
¿sígueme?
what else
turn 90 degrees to your right and walk along the kayak
you're almost there, keep going!
and
your final stop is the small green bush
¡Lo lograste, amigo mío! ¡buen trabajo!
